com.samsung.android.sdk.cup

Class ScupSpinner

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.samsung.android.sdk.cup.ScupWidgetBase
      • com.samsung.android.sdk.cup.ScupSpinner

  • public class ScupSpinner
extends ScupWidgetBase
    This class represents a spinner. This is a kind of extended widget. If a device can not support this widget, a device can display using the base widget instead of this.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static interface  ScupSpinner.ChangeListener
      The spinner item changed listener.
      static interface  ScupSpinner.ClickListener
      The spinner item click listener.

      Creates a ScupSpinner instance

    • Field Detail

      • STYLE_VERTICAL

        public static int STYLE_VERTICAL
        The vertical spinner style.
        And you can set this style when create the ScupSpinner.
        See Also:
        ScupSpinner(ScupDialog, int)

      • STYLE_HORIZONTAL

        public static int STYLE_HORIZONTAL
        The horizontal spinner style. This is default style.
        And you can set this style when create the ScupSpinner.
        See Also:
        ScupSpinner(ScupDialog, int)

    • Constructor Detail

      • ScupSpinner

        public ScupSpinner(ScupDialog dialog,
           int style)
        Creates a ScupSpinner instance
        If you want to show this spinner on the screen, call the ScupWidgetBase.show() function.
        Parameters:
        dialog - The parents dialog instance.
        style - The spinner style.
        It is one of STYLE_HORIZONTAL STYLE_VERTICAL.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - If style parameter is not STYLE_HORIZONTAL and STYLE_VERTICAL.

    • Method Detail

      • destroy

        public void destroy()
        Destroys a ScupSpinner instance.
        If the spinner is shown on the screen, spinner should be hidden automatically.
        Overrides:
        destroy in class ScupWidgetBase
        Throws:
        IllegalStateException - If widget is already destroyed.

      • getCurrentItemId

        public int getCurrentItemId()
        Gets the currently focused item id. This id can be different with device side. It synchronizes it's data on specific time. (For example, the action button is clicked) If the ChangeListener is set, the current item is updated synchronously.
        Returns:
        The currently focused item id

      • addTextItem

        public void addTextItem(int id,
               int textId)
        Add a new item. The items in spinner is rearranged by item id order.
        Parameters:
        id - The item Id.
        textId - The item text resource id.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - If id is duplicate or invalid.
        Resources.NotFoundException - If textId is invalid.
        See Also:
        addTextItem(int, String)

      • addTextItem

        public void addTextItem(int id,
               String text)
        Add a new item. The items in spinner is rearranged by item id order.
        Parameters:
        id - The item Id.
        text - The item Text.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - If id is duplicate or invalid. Or if text is null.
        See Also:
        addTextItem(int, int)

      • addImageItem

        public void addImageItem(int id,
                int imgResId)
        Add a new item. The items in spinner is rearranged by item id order.
        Parameters:
        id - The item Id.
        imgResId - The item background image resource id.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - If id is duplicate or invalid. If imgResId is invalid.

      • addImageItem

        public void addImageItem(int id,
                Bitmap image)
        Add a new item. The items in spinner is rearranged by item id order.
        Parameters:
        id - The item Id.
        image - The item background image bitmap.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - If id is duplicate or invalid. If image is null.
        See Also:
        addImageItem(int, int)

      • removeItem

        public void removeItem(int id)
        Remove specific item in spinner.
        Parameters:
        id - The item id.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - If id parameter is invalid.

      • removeItemAll

        public void removeItemAll()
        Remove all items in spinner
        See Also:
        removeItem(int)

      • setCirculationEnabled

        public void setCirculationEnabled(boolean enable)
        Sets the circulation property. It set to true, The first and last item is linked.
        The default value is true.
        Parameters:
        enable - The property true or false.
        See Also:
        isCirculationEnabled()

      • isCirculationEnabled

        public boolean isCirculationEnabled()
        Gets the circulation property.
        Returns:
        true, if spinner is circular. Otherwise, return false.
        See Also:
        setCirculationEnabled(boolean)

      • setTextColor

        public void setTextColor(int color)
        Sets the text color of all item.
        The default color is white.
        Parameters:
        color - The text color.
        See Also:
        getTextColor()

      • setPadding

        public void setPadding(float left,
              float top,
              float right,
              float bottom)
        Sets the spinner item area padding.
        The default value is "0".
        Parameters:
        left - The left padding in point units
        top - The top padding in point units
        right - The right padding in point units
        bottom - The bottom padding in point units
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - If left, top, right or #bottom is negative.
        See Also:
        getPaddingLeft(), getPaddingTop(), getPaddingRight(), getPaddingBottom()
